body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture         Keith Rocco painting, The Surrender NPS Image  The Beginning of the End  The stories of Appomattox Court House go far beyond the final significant battles of this Nation's bloody Civil War. In addition to the  surrender meeting between Generals Lee and Grant these stories from Appomattox show the far reaching effects of the war and its ending on so many different people.
title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: History & Culture
